text: Imperium Power is the indicator of your faction’s expansion. When your faction owns very few settlements (1-5), there is little maintenance. When your faction maintains over 5 settlements, there are slowly increasing benefits and penalties.\\n\\nGaining settlements increases Imperium Power while losing settlements lowers it.

Imperium Power is the indicator of your faction’s expansion. When your faction owns very few settlements (1-5), there is little maintenance. When your faction maintains over 5 settlements, there are slowly increasing benefits and penalties.\\n\\nGaining settlements increases Imperium Power while losing settlements lowers it.
Up to +20% campaign movement range depending on number of units in army.
